segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even noticed the water overflowing and making a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks like it's about to tip over, and that makes me worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her turn, reaching up towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't turned around yet to see what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, making a big puddle on the floor, and it's getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being very clever, but also very naughty, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is holding a plate, probably to catch more cookies, and it's making me a bit anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will try to climb up there too, which would be even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit chaotic, but also kind of funny in a way, seeing the children being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening before someone gets hurt or makes an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad to see the woman so unaware of what's going on around her, missing out on the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
